entry.title: Ethereum’s Long-Awaited Upgrade Gets Closer As Devs Set Final Timeline
entry.summary: The next two updates should be completed in February, setting the stage for the final upgrade to go live.

entry.title: IOTA Plots Ethereum Alignment and Traders Are Suddenly Bullish
entry.summary: Is IOTA the phoenix of crypto? As the second best performing token of the day, hardcore fans likely hope it is.

entry.title: How to Farm the Drift Protocol Airdrop on Solana
entry.summary: Drift Protocol, the largest perpetual swap futures exchange on Solana, just launched a points program ahead of an airdrop. Here's what you need to know.

entry.title: Microsoft Cuts 1,900 Xbox and Activision Staff Amid Gaming Industry Crisis
entry.summary: Nearly 6,000 game industry employees have lost their jobs already in 2024, with Microsoft now responsible for nearly one-third of the cuts.

entry.title: Rollups Are Coming to Bitcoin Through ‘Superlayer’ Protocol BitcoinOS
entry.summary: Backed by the DeFi project Sovryn, the framework is nearly trustless and has built-in anti-fraud features.

entry.title: Elon Musk's Tesla Still Holds $387 Million in Bitcoin
entry.summary: The company paper-handed its BTC during COVID-19, but then diamond handed the rest as it now focuses on AI and robotics.

entry.title: SEC Punts on Yet Another Spot Ethereum ETF
entry.summary: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission has pushed back a decision on Grayscale's spot Ethereum ETF conversion proposal.

entry.title: US Will Sell $117 Million in Bitcoin Seized From Silk Road Drug Trafficker
entry.summary: The United States plans to sell a substantial stash of Bitcoin forfeited by a convicted Silk Road drug trafficker from Maryland.

entry.title: ‘Pixels’ Game Gives Out NFTs, Ronin Tokens Ahead of Airdrop
entry.summary: The PIXEL token airdrop is nearly here—but until then, the Pixels team is keeping the buzz alive with giveaways and challenges.

entry.title: 'Britcoin' CBDC Not Ready Yet, Says Bank of England
entry.summary: British policy makers are still undecided on a digital pound—dubbed "Britcoin"—following a central bank digital currency (CBDC) consultation.

entry.title: AltLayer Airdrop Puts $100 Million Into the Wallets of Ethereum Users
entry.summary: Another day, another airdrop. About half a million Ethereum wallets can claim the AltLayer (ALT) token now.

entry.title: Bitcoin Steadies on Strong GDP Report in U.S.
entry.summary: Bitcoin remained steady on news that the U.S. economy grew more than expected during Q4, even if it did slow down from the previous quarter.

entry.summary: The gamified Bitcoin DeFi accelerator aims to be a “viral utility token,” building a DeFi and gaming ecosystem on Bitcoin.

entry.title: AI Developer Refutes ‘Eternal You’ Documentary, Calls Foul on Its Depiction of His Chatbot
entry.summary: Jason Rohrer says the interactions with his AI model, based on a deceased person, were taken out of context in a new film screened at Sundance.

entry.title: Judge Blocks CZ Travel to UAE, Despite Offer to Use $4.5B Binance Equity as Security
entry.summary: The Binance founder had requested to travel to the UAE to be present for the “hospitalization and surgery” of an unnamed individual.

entry.summary: Bitcoin-related stocks like Coinbase and MicroStrategy are down as the price of the biggest cryptocurrency takes a heavy hit this month.

entry.title: 'Look Touch Own': OONA Discusses Her Performance Art Exhibition
entry.summary: Conceptual artist OONA joins moderator Raina Marie to discuss "Look Touch Own," her performance art exhibition featuring her own former breast implants, which have been tokenized. This conversation was recorded at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel Miami in December 2023.

entry.title: Genius Marketing by Genius Marketers: How Crypto Builders Can Reach the Masses
entry.summary: Rug Radio founder Farokh Sarmad moderates a conversation between 9dcc founder and CEO Gmoney and Serotonin founder and CEO Amanda Cassatt about the challenges and opportunities in Web3 marketing and how they're navigating the ever-evolving space. Recorded at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel Miami in December 2023.

entry.title: Generative Art Across Mediums: Artists Discuss the Evolving Space
entry.summary: In this panel discussion from Rug Radio's R Haus at Art Basel Miami 2023, Sofia Garcia, Ismail Tazi, Emily Edelman, and Aleksandra Art discuss the expanding generative art space—and why "generative" doesn't necessarily have to mean digital.

entry.summary: Reza is joined by Mike Grantis from Contango Digital to discuss - The AI coin to rule them all - The Solana Ecosystem - What's next for Solana airdrops

entry.title: Conversation With Snowfro: Bringing 'Chromie Squiggle' #8107 to the Physical Space

entry.title: Don't Underestimate Mobile Gaming: Qualcomm's Matthew Grossman

entry.title: Bitcoin ETF: This Is the 'Calm Before the Storm', Says ETF Analyst
entry.summary: Bloomberg Senior ETF Analyst Eric Balchunas joins Farokh Sarmad, Michael Anderson, and Ovie Faruq on the FOMO Hour to share the latest intel on the looming approval for a spot Bitcoin ETF, what might happen when the very different worlds of TradFi and crypto collide, and his insights on “Genslish,” the unique and strategic language of SEC chair Gary Gensler.
